mapper.select: select count(*) from activity_info inner join region_sigungu ON (activity_info.sigungu_id = region_sigungu.sigungu_id) where sido_id = #{sidoId}

SELECT a_id, a_img_id, a_name, a_one_liner, a_thumbnail_img, a_theme_id, sigungu_id, a_favorite_cnt, sido_id FROM ( SELECT seq, a_id, a_img_id, a_name, a_one_liner, a_thumbnail_img, a_theme_id, sigungu_id, a_favorite_cnt, sido_id FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, a_id, a_img_id, a_name, a_one_liner, a_thumbnail_img, a_theme_id, sigungu_id, a_favorite_cnt, sido_id FROM ( SELECT activity_info.a_id, activity_info.a_img_id, activity_info.a_name, activity_info.a_one_liner, activity_info.a_thumbnail_img, activity_info.a_theme_id, activity_info.sigungu_id, activity_post.a_favorite_cnt, region_sigungu.sido_id FROM activity_info inner join activity_post ON activity_info.a_id = activity_post.a_id inner join region_sigungu ON activity_info.sigungu_id = region_sigungu.sigungu_id WHERE region_sigungu.sido_id = #{sidoId} ORDER BY activity_info.a_id DESC ) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE seq <= #{endPostNo}
